Ability: Irradiates the airspace in a radius of 9 around the Disruptor, dealing20damage every 36 frames (2.4 in-game seconds) to enemy aerial units and reducing their firepower by 20%
The firepower debuff lingers for 40 frames (2.67 in-game seconds) after the affected units leave the Disruptor's radius
Notes: Loses 1 hit point every frame (0.07 in-game seconds)
Cannot be deployed near enemy airfields
Does not keep the player in game ifShort Gameis enabled in skirmish and multiplayer
